channel.title: Saros - Success is our number one priority
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2iu9k7n.jpg[/img] The next leading rsps
[url=http://www.sarosps.com]Home[/url] - [url=http://www.sarosps.com/forum]Forums[/url] - [URL=http://www.sarosps.com/forum/index.php?/forum/28-download-client//"]Play Now[/URL] Saros is a 317 server, loading lower and higher game-frame data, At Saros we strive for perfection, we listen to everyone's feedback as even the smallest of bugs are important to fix!
Have you ever played a server for a few hours and didn't think it was the right server for you? well Saros is the right server for you! with many unique features, making the game play endless without the community being bored.
Why are we different? we may not be the best, but we are defiantly worth your time! we are different because we care about you! your game play experience, anything that's reported we will immediately get onto fixing it, any suggestions we think is fit to be implemented into Saros we will try our hardest to get it done as soon as possible for you members to enjoy! all of our content releases will make your game play experience more enjoyable! Constantly improving our content you will enjoy, from little features to massive improvements!
We're constantly developing the server, adding features for the members of Saros! we want to give to the community, give you a server you want to come back and play. Our staff team at Saros have experience in development, also professionalism and we're also looking to help out the community in anyway we can!
Any Saros staff member will help you out in anyway possible, from a question to helping you fight bosses in-game, anything you're stuck on we will help you! So you can enjoy your game play.
At Saros we believe that every member should enjoy their game play, no matter what. Weather you're a new member to the community or an existing member, so we offer the best user experience around.
We dedicate our time to sorting the smallest and biggest of problems out, no matter what the problem is, we will fix it so the member is happy and active with our growing and thriving community,
We're full of unique content, constantly updating our content to make your game experience even better! So why not join Saros? make friends within the community, want to best among others? come and battle your way up through the highscores being the best!
We care about your game experience, the staff members at Saros do not believe in the 'pay to win' method. Every member has equal chances to become a wealthy member, also a strong mighty adventurer! if you contribute towards Saros you get many benefits but it does not mean you will be better than any non-contributer. This is to make all users game experience equal,fair, and enjoyable.
Most items that are in the shop for the people who contributer towards Saros are also a boss drop, so you can try your luck and camp the bosses to obtain these items!
Saros has a good economy, we manage it well, so do you like a challenge? try to be one of the wealthiest ! We make sure it's a challenge to become some what wealthy, yet it isn't to much of a challenge for the new members.
We have discontinued items, such as: basket of eggs, bunny ears, santa hats, party hats, sled. They're all items obtained from special offers or holiday events, so they actually have a value of rarity.[/ADMIN]
[SPOILER=Saros's Team] [SIZE=3]Matt - Founder Jeremy - Developer[/SIZE]
[SIZE=1]*Recruiting Web & Game Developers*[/SIZE] [SIZE=1]Message Matt on the community forums[/SIZE] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Development Log]
Run energy no longer drains UNLESS you are in the wilderness. This should help a few of the skillers out quite a bit.
Fixed Callisto showing up as a combat stone in the wilderness that attacks players.
Fixed elegant pieces so they equipped correctly as well as removed the level requirements to equip black pieces.
Added iron arrow support to regular longbow and shortbow
Added the following bosses to the npc log:
Bandos Zamorak Saradomin Armadyl Dagannoth Supreme Dagannoth Prime Dagannoth Rex Scorpia Vet'ion Venenatis Callisto Chaos Elemental Sea Troll Queen Sea Snake Penance Queen Dark Beast Abyssal Demon
Added more drops to all monsters. You will obtain uncut gems, herb seeds, rune essence, and key halves from most NPC's now. If there needs to be any tweaks let the development team know!
Edited a few more shop prices due to this drop update.
Removed uncut gems, dragon leather, and rune essence from the skilling supply shop. I feel it'll make skilling more rewarding this way.
Removed infinity from slayer shop, and replaced (i) rings with regular ones.
Rewrote fishing skill so now you can no longer bank and fish at the same time. Fishing Zone is now at the fishing guild.
Rewrote cooking skill so it doesn't do the inventory all at once, and brings up the interface for cooking.
Added Minigames teleport with the option for pest control and fight caves.
Made firemaking move you west one spot, unless there is an object west of you, then it'll push you back east. Also you cannot light fires around or inside of banks.
Dagannoth kings now drop imbued rings
DKS will announce when you get dragon axe, and any imbued ring
Added in 2x exp ring for extreme donators +
Fixed shop price on blue d'hide bodies
Lowered shop prices on mystic pieces and runes
Made it so if your slayer is greater than 30 you can't get an easy task, and if it's greater than 50 you can't get a medium task (this is to prevent slayer point farming).
Slayer System
Here is how the slayer system works:
All monsters give NPC HP * 50 experience per kill. If your combat level is 3-49 you get 3 slayer points per task (8 points if wearing slayer helm) On the completion of the task you get the npcs HP 400 bonus experience (with slayer helm you get NPC HP 250 bonus experience on top of the normal bonus) [EXAMPLE] If you kill a hill giant with 35 hp you get 1750 xp per kill, and on task completion you get 14,000 bonus exp or 14,000 + 8,750 bonus exp with helm
If your combat level is 50-90 you get 5 points per task (10 if wearing slayer helm) On the completion of the task you get NPC Hp 500 bonus experience (with slayer helm you get NPC HP 250 bonus experience on top of the normal bonus)
If your combat level is 91-120 you get 8 slayer points per task (13 if wearing slayer helm) On the completion of the task you get NPC Hp 600 bonus experience (with slayer helm you get NPC HP 250 bonus experience on top of the normal bonus)
If your combat level is 121-126 you get 10 slayer points per task (15 if wearing slayer helm) On the completion of the task you get NPC Hp 700 bonus experience (with slayer helm you get NPC HP 250 bonus experience on top of the normal bonus)
Removed the wilderness gate in level 50 wild.
Lowered seed prices to shop as I will be adding in seeds to all monsters.
Fixed several command issues. ::forum will now send you to the forums, and ::updates will send you to the updates section on forums.
Client Updates:
Fixed private message bug causing double messages from donators to other players.
Client Fixes:
Matching Item IDs client sided so they match the item ID server sided. (Please note, if you find any Dwarf Remains pick them up and let me know where you found them so I can add the real item to the drop)
Made ::osrs and ::525 actually switch the gameframe.
Fixed clan chat errors client sided, so you can now use CC's again.
Added normal skin colors to the make-over mage. May add custom colors to donator zone in future.
Server Fixes:
Made Morrigan's throwing axes and javelins stackable
Removed the announcement when staff logs in to server.
Changed the default clan chat to "Help"
Changed the message received from Vannaka when you already have a slayer task.
Fixed several shop price issues.
Disabled yell messages for staff and donators logging in.
Lowered prayer drain at Venenatis (chance to lower it 0-15 points).
Added correct teleporting to dueling ring, games necklace, and amulet of glory. //TODO add fountain of rune to recharge glory
Boss teleports fixed, so you can tele to wildy bosses
Added NPC kill total + boss kill total
Cleaned up the quest tab
Dragon darts now act as a ranged weapon
The chest at edgevile now faces the correct direction
Commands are no longer case sensitive, you can type ::train or ::Train or even ::TrAiN
Better player following system
Fixed clipping through walls when attacking NPCS
Fixed slayer tower staircase bugs + temporary system to go through doors
Fixed an issue causing players to teleport after clicking a tele, then clicking away, then clicking an npc with tele options
Fixed skillcape shop so it autoupdates a new cape when you hit 99
Added a preventative measure to donator shop, if an item isn't priced by default it shows up as 10,000 instead of 0
Reworked the starter packages
Fixed issue where you continued woodcutting after clicking away from tree.
Added Bandos Boss kill counter + achivement points when killing 50, 175, 250, 500, 1000, 1350, and 2000 kills.
Started moving skill locations around
Fixed donator shop prices
Added drops to black dragons
Fixed hard slayer tasks, it was giving a server error and not assigning tasks correctly
Made thieving rates 800xp, 3000xp, 8000xp, 12500xp, and 15000xp per stall.
You can now cut uncut dragonstones into cut dragonstones.
You can now cut uncut diamonds into cut diamonds.
Changed donator zone location
Added more NPCs to the donator zone
Added rocktail fishing, rune ore mining and magic tree woodcutting to the donator zone
17.04.2015
Added ::shops
Tided up the NPC spawns
Added more mystery box rewards
Added more crystal key rewards
Improved NPC drops (added more drops)
Added more bosses
Changed the donator zone location
Made the Giant Sea Snake attack-able
Made the Sea Troll Queen multi-combat
Fixed the dragonfire shield.
Added rocktail fishing and magic trees in the donator zone
Tided up the shops. [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Server Media]
* Achievements have been added, released in future updates (content release) * [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2a4uyds.png[/img][IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2yk0uv5.png[/img]
More total boss kills have been added
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2qdto4o.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/35bcx7t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/257hpjs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2m5dr1i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/34tevf7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/28grxms.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/fkbg3l.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Features] Achievements (added in future updates, content release) Daily Updates Re-worked slayer Stable, combat system A load of enjoyable minigames Hosted on a server guaranteeing 99.9% uptime Clan chat system Team bossing abilities Re-worked combat system 21 working skills Cleaned NPCs Stable Economy (correct rarity of items) active community A change of osrs to 525 game-frame 10 + bosses Pking highscores Skill cape emotes IPB forum software[/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Saros - Success is our number one priority
item.dc:creator: @Saros Saros
item.description:
@Saros wrote:

[CENTER]


The next leading rsps

Home - Forums - [URL=http://www.sarosps.com/forum/index.php?/forum/28-download-client//"]Play Now[/URL]
Saros is a 317 server, loading lower and higher game-frame data, At Saros we strive for perfection, we listen to everyone’s feedback as even the smallest of bugs are important to fix!

Have you ever played a server for a few hours and didn’t think it was the right server for you? well Saros is the right server for you! with many unique features, making the game play endless without the community being bored.

Why are we different? we may not be the best, but we are defiantly worth your time! we are different because we care about you! your game play experience, anything that’s reported we will
immediately get onto fixing it, any suggestions we think is fit to be implemented into Saros we will try our hardest to get it done as soon as possible for you members to enjoy! all of our content releases will make your game play experience more enjoyable!
Constantly improving our content you will enjoy, from little features to massive improvements!

We’re constantly developing the server, adding features for the members of Saros! we want to give to the community, give you a server you want to come back and play. Our staff team at Saros have experience in development, also professionalism and we’re also looking to help out the community in anyway we can!

Any Saros staff member will help you out in anyway possible, from a question to helping you fight bosses in-game, anything you’re stuck on we will help you! So you can enjoy your game play.

At Saros we believe that every member should enjoy their game play, no matter what. Weather you’re a new member to the community or an existing member, so we offer the best user experience around.

We dedicate our time to sorting the smallest and biggest of problems out, no matter what the problem is, we will fix it so the member is happy and active with our growing and thriving community,

We’re full of unique content, constantly updating our content to make your game experience even better! So why not join Saros? make friends within the community, want to best among others? come and battle your way up through the highscores being the best!

We care about your game experience, the staff members at Saros do not believe in the ‘pay to win’ method. Every member has equal chances to become a wealthy member, also a strong mighty adventurer! if you contribute towards Saros you get many benefits but it does not mean you will be better than any non-contributer. This is to make all users game experience equal,fair, and enjoyable.

Most items that are in the shop for the people who contributer towards Saros are also a boss drop, so you can try your luck and camp the bosses to obtain these items!

Saros has a good economy, we manage it well, so do you like a challenge? try to be one of the wealthiest !
We make sure it’s a challenge to become some what wealthy, yet it isn’t to much of a challenge for the new members.

We have discontinued items, such as: basket of eggs, bunny ears, santa hats, party hats, sled.
They’re all items obtained from special offers or holiday events, so they actually have a value of rarity.[/ADMIN]

[SPOILER=Saros’s Team]
[SIZE=3]Matt - Founder
Jeremy - Developer[/SIZE]

[SIZE=1]Recruiting Web & Game Developers[/SIZE]
[SIZE=1]Message Matt on the community forums[/SIZE]
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Development Log]

Run energy no longer drains UNLESS you are in the wilderness. This should help a few of the skillers out quite a bit.

Fixed Callisto showing up as a combat stone in the wilderness that attacks players.

Fixed elegant pieces so they equipped correctly as well as removed the level requirements to equip black pieces.

Added iron arrow support to regular longbow and shortbow

Added the following bosses to the npc log:

Bandos
Zamorak
Saradomin
Armadyl
Dagannoth Supreme
Dagannoth Prime
Dagannoth Rex
Scorpia
Vet’ion
Venenatis
Callisto
Chaos Elemental
Sea Troll Queen
Sea Snake
Penance Queen
Dark Beast
Abyssal Demon

Added more drops to all monsters. You will obtain uncut gems, herb seeds, rune essence, and key halves from most NPC’s now. If there needs to be any tweaks let the development team know!

Edited a few more shop prices due to this drop update.

Removed uncut gems, dragon leather, and rune essence from the skilling supply shop. I feel it’ll make skilling more rewarding this way.

Removed infinity from slayer shop, and replaced (i) rings with regular ones.

Rewrote fishing skill so now you can no longer bank and fish at the same time. Fishing Zone is now at the fishing guild.

Rewrote cooking skill so it doesn’t do the inventory all at once, and brings up the interface for cooking.

Added Minigames teleport with the option for pest control and fight caves.

Made firemaking move you west one spot, unless there is an object west of you, then it’ll push you back east. Also you cannot light fires around or inside of banks.

Dagannoth kings now drop imbued rings

DKS will announce when you get dragon axe, and any imbued ring

Added in 2x exp ring for extreme donators +

Fixed shop price on blue d’hide bodies

Lowered shop prices on mystic pieces and runes

Made it so if your slayer is greater than 30 you can’t get an easy task, and if it’s greater than 50 you can’t get a medium task (this is to prevent slayer point farming).

Slayer System

Here is how the slayer system works:

All monsters give NPC HP * 50 experience per kill.
If your combat level is 3-49 you get 3 slayer points per task (8 points if wearing slayer helm)
On the completion of the task you get the npcs HP 400 bonus experience (with slayer helm you get NPC HP 250 bonus experience on top of the normal bonus)
[EXAMPLE] If you kill a hill giant with 35 hp you get 1750 xp per kill, and on task completion you get 14,000 bonus exp or 14,000 + 8,750 bonus exp with helm

If your combat level is 50-90 you get 5 points per task (10 if wearing slayer helm)
On the completion of the task you get NPC Hp 500 bonus experience (with slayer helm you get NPC HP 250 bonus experience on top of the normal bonus)

If your combat level is 91-120 you get 8 slayer points per task (13 if wearing slayer helm)
On the completion of the task you get NPC Hp 600 bonus experience (with slayer helm you get NPC HP 250 bonus experience on top of the normal bonus)

If your combat level is 121-126 you get 10 slayer points per task (15 if wearing slayer helm)
On the completion of the task you get NPC Hp 700 bonus experience (with slayer helm you get NPC HP 250 bonus experience on top of the normal bonus)

Removed the wilderness gate in level 50 wild.

Lowered seed prices to shop as I will be adding in seeds to all monsters.

Fixed several command issues. ::forum will now send you to the forums, and ::updates will send you to the updates section on forums.

Client Updates:

Fixed private message bug causing double messages from donators to other players.

Client Fixes:

Matching Item IDs client sided so they match the item ID server sided. (Please note, if you find any Dwarf Remains pick them up and let me know where you found
them so I can add the real item to the drop)

Made ::osrs and ::525 actually switch the gameframe.

Fixed clan chat errors client sided, so you can now use CC’s again.

Added normal skin colors to the make-over mage. May add custom colors to donator zone in future.

Server Fixes:

Made Morrigan’s throwing axes and javelins stackable

Removed the announcement when staff logs in to server.

Changed the default clan chat to “Help”

Changed the message received from Vannaka when you already have a slayer task.

Fixed several shop price issues.

Disabled yell messages for staff and donators logging in.

Lowered prayer drain at Venenatis (chance to lower it 0-15 points).

Added correct teleporting to dueling ring, games necklace, and amulet of glory. //TODO add fountain of rune to recharge glory

Boss teleports fixed, so you can tele to wildy bosses

Added NPC kill total + boss kill total

Cleaned up the quest tab

Dragon darts now act as a ranged weapon

The chest at edgevile now faces the correct direction

Commands are no longer case sensitive, you can type ::train or ::Train or even ::TrAiN

Better player following system

Fixed clipping through walls when attacking NPCS

Fixed slayer tower staircase bugs + temporary system to go through doors

Fixed an issue causing players to teleport after clicking a tele, then clicking away, then clicking an npc with tele options

Fixed skillcape shop so it autoupdates a new cape when you hit 99

Added a preventative measure to donator shop, if an item isn’t priced by default it shows up as 10,000 instead of 0

Reworked the starter packages

Fixed issue where you continued woodcutting after clicking away from tree.

Added Bandos Boss kill counter + achivement points when killing 50, 175, 250, 500, 1000, 1350, and 2000 kills.

Started moving skill locations around

Fixed donator shop prices

Added drops to black dragons

Fixed hard slayer tasks, it was giving a server error and not assigning tasks correctly

Made thieving rates 800xp, 3000xp, 8000xp, 12500xp, and 15000xp per stall.

You can now cut uncut dragonstones into cut dragonstones.

You can now cut uncut diamonds into cut diamonds.

Changed donator zone location

Added more NPCs to the donator zone

Added rocktail fishing, rune ore mining and magic tree woodcutting to the donator zone

17.04.2015

Added ::shops

Tided up the NPC spawns

Added more mystery box rewards

Added more crystal key rewards

Improved NPC drops (added more drops)

Added more bosses

Changed the donator zone location

Made the Giant Sea Snake attack-able

Made the Sea Troll Queen multi-combat

Fixed the dragonfire shield.

Added rocktail fishing and magic trees in the donator zone

Tided up the shops.
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Server Media]

  • Achievements have been added, released in future updates (content release) *

More total boss kills have been added






[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Features]
Achievements (added in future updates, content release)
Daily Updates
Re-worked slayer
Stable, combat system
A load of enjoyable minigames
Hosted on a server guaranteeing 99.9% uptime
Clan chat system
Team bossing abilities
Re-worked combat system
21 working skills
Cleaned NPCs
Stable Economy (correct rarity of items)
active community
A change of osrs to 525 game-frame
10 + bosses
Pking highscores
Skill cape emotes
IPB forum software[/SPOILER]

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: Saros - Success is our number one priority
